scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:linux && npm run deploy:macos && npm run deploy:win
scripts.deploy:linux: aws s3 cp build/openkbs-linux-x64 s3://openkbs-downloads/cli/linux/openkbs && aws s3 cp build/openkbs-linux-arm64 s3://openkbs-downloads/cli/linux/openkbs-arm64
scripts.deploy:macos: aws s3 cp build/openkbs-macos-arm64 s3://openkbs-downloads/cli/macos/openkbs && aws s3 cp build/openkbs-macos-x64 s3://openkbs-downloads/cli/macos/openkbs-x64
scripts.deploy:win: aws s3 cp build/openkbs-win-x64.exe s3://openkbs-downloads/cli/windows/openkbs.exe && aws s3 cp build/openkbs-win-arm64.exe s3://openkbs-downloads/cli/windows/openkbs-arm64.exe
